item.title: Trump signals U.S. and U.K. could reach 'real trade deal' without tariffs
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump signaled the U.K. could broker a "real trade deal" and escape tariffs.

item.title: As Trump breaks ranks with Europe, are Asia-Pacific allies next?
item.description: The Trump administration's focus on the price, not value, of alliances could affect security pledges and risks to Taiwan, experts say.

item.title: Watch live: Trump holds joint press conference with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer
Trump says Mexico, Canada tariffs will start March 4, plus additional 10% on China
item.description: President Donald Trump said his proposed tariffs on Mexico and Canada will go into effect March 4, and that China will be charged an additional 10% ta...

item.title: Trump threatens to slap 25% tariffs on EU, says bloc was always meant to hurt the U.S.
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose 25% tariffs on imports from the European Union, claiming that the bloc was formed "to screw" the U.S.
